description: Align coderef-docs and coderef-workflow tool documentation with new Papertrail UDS standards, schemas, and validators

orchestrator.role: Aggregate Phase 1 inventory reports into master document
orchestrator.notes: ✅ Complete - Created master inventory aggregating 3 agent reports. Key findings: 37 tools, 50 outputs, only 12% validated (6/50). Critical gap: 11 file types have schemas + validators available but not integrated. Identified 7 high-priority misalignments including communication.json, context.json, and all foundation docs.

agents.notes: ✅ Complete - Documented 8 schemas (base, foundation, workorder, plan, session, system, standards, communication), 10 validators, ValidatorFactory auto-detection, score calculation algorithm, integration patterns for coderef-docs and coderef-workflow. Created both JSON (structured) and MD (human-readable) standards guides.

✅ Complete - Inventoried 13 tools generating 18 distinct outputs. 4 validated outputs (CHANGELOG.json via jsonschema, audit reports via standards, Papertrail UDS validation/health). 14 unvalidated outputs (foundation docs, quickref, resource sheets, standards). Includes .coderef/ integration notes and Papertrail UDS integration details.
✅ Complete - Inventoried 24 tools generating 32 outputs. Only 2 outputs validated (plan.json, DELIVERABLES.md). DELIVERABLES.md uses full Papertrail integration. 30 outputs need validation.
